00001 // gang multiple objects together
00002 // © 2005 by Tim Place
00003 
00004 #include "Jamoma.h"
00005 
00006 #define NUM_INLETS 4
00007 #define NUM_OUTLETS 4
00008 #define MAX_LIST_LENGTH 256
00009 
00010 
00011 // Data Structure for this object
00012 typedef struct _gang{
00013         t_object                ob;
00014         void                    *obex;
00015         void                    *outlets[NUM_OUTLETS];
00016         void                    *inlets[NUM_INLETS];            // for proxy inlets
00017         bool                    type_is_list;                           // flag for the data type (false=float, true=list)
00018         bool                    set_by_pp;                                      // flag: if true, the value was set by pp, which takes precedance
00019         float                   parameter_value;                        // FLOAT INPUT
00020         float                   parameter_value_pp;
00021         t_atom                  argv[MAX_LIST_LENGTH];          // LIST INPUT: stored atoms for output
00022         short                   argc;                                           // LIST INPUT: len
00023         void                    *qelem_send_pp;                         // queue element
00024         void                    *qelem_send_ui;                         // queue element
00025         void                    *qelem_send_pattr;                      // queue element
00026         void                    *qelem_send_scope;                      // queue element
00027 } t_gang;
00028 
00029 // Prototypes for methods: need a method for each incoming message type:
00030 void *gang_new(t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00031 void gang_free(t_gang *x);
00032 void gang_assist(t_gang *x, void *b, long msg, long arg, char *dst);
00033 void gang_int(t_gang *x, long value);
00034 void gang_float(t_gang *x, double value);
00035 void gang_list(t_gang *x, t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00036 void gang_qfn_send_pp(t_gang *x);
00037 void gang_qfn_send_ui(t_gang *x);
00038 void gang_qfn_send_pattr(t_gang *x);
00039 void gang_qfn_send_scope(t_gang *x);
00040 float gang_bitsafe(double in);
00041 
00042 // Class Globals
00043 t_class         *gang_class;                                            // Required. Global pointing to this class
00044 
00045 
00046 /************************************************************************************/
00047 // Main() Function
00048 
00049 int main(void)                          // main recieves a copy of the Max function macros table
00050 {
00051         t_class *c;
00052         
00053         jamoma_init();
00054 
00055         c = class_new("jcom.gang",(method)gang_new, (method)gang_free, (short)sizeof(t_gang), (method)0L, A_GIMME, 0);
00056         class_obexoffset_set(c, calcoffset(t_gang, obex));
00057 
00058         class_addmethod(c, (method)gang_float,  "float",        0L);
00059         class_addmethod(c, (method)gang_int,    "int",          0L);
00060         class_addmethod(c, (method)gang_list,   "list",         A_GIMME, 0L);
00061     class_addmethod(c, (method)gang_assist, "assist",   A_CANT, 0L); 
00062 
00063         // Finalize our class
00064         class_register(CLASS_BOX, c);
00065         gang_class = c;
00066 
00067         return 0;
00068 }
00069 
00070 
00071 /************************************************************************************/
00072 // Object Creation Method
00073 
00074 void *gang_new(t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00075 {
00076         t_gang *x;
00077         short i;
00078          
00079         x = (t_gang *)object_alloc(gang_class);
00080         if(x){
00081                 // outlets
00082                 object_obex_store((void *)x, _sym_dumpout, (object *)outlet_new(x,NULL));       
00083                 for(i = NUM_OUTLETS-1; i>=0; i--)
00084                 x->outlets[i] = floatout(x);
00085         
00086                 // Create Inlets (inlets beyond the default (num 0) inlet)
00087                 for (i = NUM_INLETS-1; i >= 1; i--)
00088                         x->inlets[i] = proxy_new(x, i, 0L);
00089 
00090                 // defaults
00091                 x->parameter_value = -2000000;
00092                 x->argc = 0;
00093                 x->set_by_pp = false;
00094                         
00095                 // qelem
00096                 x->qelem_send_ui = qelem_new(x, (method)gang_qfn_send_ui);
00097                 x->qelem_send_pp = qelem_new(x, (method)gang_qfn_send_pp);
00098                 x->qelem_send_pattr = qelem_new(x, (method)gang_qfn_send_pattr);
00099                 x->qelem_send_scope = qelem_new(x, (method)gang_qfn_send_scope);
00100 
00101                 //handle attribute args 
00102         attr_args_process(x, argc, argv); 
00103     }
00104         return (x);
00105 }
00106 
00107 void gang_free(t_gang *x)
00108 {
00109         short i;
00110         
00111         qelem_free(x->qelem_send_ui);
00112         qelem_free(x->qelem_send_pp);
00113         qelem_free(x->qelem_send_pattr);
00114         qelem_free(x->qelem_send_scope);
00115 
00116         for (i = NUM_INLETS-1; i >= 1; i--)
00117                 freeobject((t_object *)x->inlets[i]);
00118 }
00119 
00120 /************************************************************************************/
00121 // Methods bound to input/inlets
00122 
00123 // Method for Assistance Messages
00124 void gang_assist(t_gang *x, void *b, long msg, long arg, char *dst)
00125 {
00126         if(msg==1){             // Inlets
00127                 switch(arg){
00128                         case 0: strcpy(dst, "connect to ui object"); break;
00129                         case 1: strcpy(dst, "connect to pp"); break;
00130                         case 2: strcpy(dst, "aux object 1"); break;
00131                         case 3: strcpy(dst, "aux object 2"); break;
00132                 }
00133         }
00134         else if(msg==2){        // Outlets
00135                 switch(arg){
00136                         case 0: strcpy(dst, "connect to ui object"); break;
00137                         case 1: strcpy(dst, "connect to pp"); break;
00138                         case 2: strcpy(dst, "aux object 1"); break;
00139                         case 3: strcpy(dst, "aux object 2"); break;
00140                         default: strcpy(dst, "dumpout"); break;
00141                 }
00142         }
00143 }

00145 
00146 // METHOD: int conversion
00147 void gang_int(t_gang *x, long value)
00148 {
00149         gang_float(x, value);
00150 }
00151 
00152 
00153 // METHOD: float input
00154 void gang_float(t_gang *x, double value)
00155 {
00156         long inletnum = proxy_getinlet((object *)x);
00157         
00158         if(value == x->parameter_value) return;
00159         //x->parameter_value = value;
00160         x->parameter_value = gang_bitsafe(value);
00161         x->type_is_list = false;
00162 
00163         switch(inletnum){
00164                 case 0:                 // UI Input
00165                         qelem_set(x->qelem_send_pp);
00166                         qelem_set(x->qelem_send_pattr);
00167                         qelem_set(x->qelem_send_scope);
00168                         break;
00169                 case 1:                 // PP Input
00170                         x->set_by_pp = true;
00171                         x->parameter_value_pp = x->parameter_value;
00172                         qelem_set(x->qelem_send_ui);
00173                         qelem_set(x->qelem_send_pattr);
00174                         qelem_set(x->qelem_send_scope);
00175                         break;
00176                 case 2:                 // Pattr Input
00177                         qelem_set(x->qelem_send_pp);
00178                         qelem_set(x->qelem_send_ui);
00179                         qelem_set(x->qelem_send_scope);
00180                         break;
00181                 case 3:                 // Scope Input
00182                         qelem_set(x->qelem_send_pp);
00183                         qelem_set(x->qelem_send_ui);
00184                         qelem_set(x->qelem_send_pattr);
00185                         break;
00186         }
00187 }
00188 
00189 
00190 // METHOD: list input
00191 void gang_list(t_gang *x, t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00192 {
00193         long inletnum = proxy_getinlet((object *)x);
00194         short i,n;
00195         Atom *ap;
00196         
00197 //      if(x->set_by_pp == false) return;       // this has already been set by pp, which takes precedance
00198         
00199         n = MIN(MAX_LIST_LENGTH, argc);
00200         ap = x->argv;
00201         x->type_is_list = true;
00202 
00203         // check to see if the list has changed
00204         for(i=0; i<n; i++){
00205                 if(atom_getfloat(ap+i) != atom_getfloat(argv+i)) goto process;
00206         }
00207         return;
00208         
00209 process:
00210         // copy input to our private copy
00211         for(i=0; i < n; i++, argv++, ap++){
00212 //              *ap = *argv;
00213                 atom_setfloat(ap, gang_bitsafe(atom_getfloat(argv)));
00214 
00215         }
00216         x->argc = n;
00217 
00218         switch(inletnum){
00219                 case 0:                 // UI Input
00220                         qelem_set(x->qelem_send_pp);
00221                         qelem_set(x->qelem_send_pattr);
00222                         qelem_set(x->qelem_send_scope);
00223                         break;
00224                 case 1:                 // PP Input
00225                         qelem_set(x->qelem_send_ui);
00226                         qelem_set(x->qelem_send_pattr);
00227                         qelem_set(x->qelem_send_scope);
00228                         break;
00229                 case 2:                 // Pattr Input
00230                         qelem_set(x->qelem_send_pp);
00231                         qelem_set(x->qelem_send_ui);
00232                         qelem_set(x->qelem_send_scope);
00233                         break;
00234                 case 3:                 // Scope Input
00235                         qelem_set(x->qelem_send_pp);
00236                         qelem_set(x->qelem_send_ui);
00237                         qelem_set(x->qelem_send_pattr);
00238                         break;
00239         }
00240 }
00241 
00242 
00243 // METHOD: Queue Function
00244 void gang_qfn_send_ui(t_gang *x)
00245 {       
00246         if(x->type_is_list)
00247                 outlet_list(x->outlets[0], _sym_list, x->argc, x->argv);
00248         else{
00249                 if(x->set_by_pp)        outlet_float(x->outlets[0], x->parameter_value_pp);
00250                 else                            outlet_float(x->outlets[0], x->parameter_value);
00251         }
00252         x->set_by_pp = false;
00253 }
00254 
00255 // METHOD: Queue Function
00256 void gang_qfn_send_pp(t_gang *x)
00257 {       
00258         if(x->type_is_list)
00259                 outlet_list(x->outlets[1], _sym_list, x->argc, x->argv);
00260         else{
00261                 if(x->set_by_pp)        outlet_float(x->outlets[1], x->parameter_value_pp);
00262                 else                            outlet_float(x->outlets[1], x->parameter_value);
00263         }
00264         x->set_by_pp = false;
00265 }
00266 
00267 // METHOD: Queue Function
00268 void gang_qfn_send_pattr(t_gang *x)
00269 {       
00270         if(x->type_is_list)
00271                 outlet_list(x->outlets[2], _sym_list, x->argc, x->argv);
00272         else{
00273                 if(x->set_by_pp)        outlet_float(x->outlets[2], x->parameter_value_pp);
00274                 else                            outlet_float(x->outlets[2], x->parameter_value);
00275         }
00276         x->set_by_pp = false;
00277 }
00278 
00279 // METHOD: Queue Function
00280 void gang_qfn_send_scope(t_gang *x)
00281 {       
00282         if(x->type_is_list)
00283                 outlet_list(x->outlets[3], _sym_list, x->argc, x->argv);
00284         else{
00285                 if(x->set_by_pp)        outlet_float(x->outlets[3], x->parameter_value_pp);
00286                 else                            outlet_float(x->outlets[3], x->parameter_value);
00287         }
00288         x->set_by_pp = false;
00289 }

00292 // FILTER OUT NANs
00293 float gang_bitsafe(double in)
00294 {
00295         double temp = in;
00296         if(temp != in)  // nan does not equal itself
00297                 temp = 0;
00298         return(temp);
00299 }
